arts.sum: He was expected to be in the offing for a surprise return to the France National team after impressing with Olympique Lyonnais this season, but Didier Deschamps opted against calling…

arts.ttl: Rayan Cherki: ‘Big balls’ and boxing as Man Utd target finally lives up to wonderkid billing
arts.sum: Rayan Cherki has long been touted as the next big thing to come out of Ligue 1 but after years of flattering to deceive, the Lyon talent is finally putting it together and has a very real case to make a move to a giant club next summer. Rayan Cherki: ‘Big balls’ and boxing as Man Utd target finally lives up to wonderkid billing
